awards.title: Gold Stevie® Award at the Women in Business Awards for STORIES OF POSSIBLE
awards.description:
Created, produced and directed by Aline Stanworth, SABIC Stories of Possible won Gold Stevie® Award in the Communications or PR Campaign of the Year and of a Bronze Stevie® Award in the Marketing Campaign of the Year, both Business-to-Business categories in the 12th annual Stevie Awards for Women in Business. 

The Stevie Awards for Women in Business are the world’s top honors for female entrepreneurs, executives, employees and the organizations they run. The 2015 awards received more than 1,300 nominations from 31 nations and territories from organizations of all sizes and industries in more than 90 categories, including Entrepreneur of the Year, Executive of the Year, Company of the Year, among others.
awards.issuer: The Stevie Awards for Women in Business

awards.title: Honorable Mention, Andreas Award for Innovation in Corporate Communication
awards.description: The prestigious Andreas Award recognises innovative academic work in the field of Corporate Communications. My thesis, The Circular Alignment, had the following review from the jury: “This thesis is unique due to the sophisticated approach in framing a line of arguments around the added value of the plastic industry by showcasing the economic potential hits, and other at first sight polluting industries, have if we shift seriously to a Circular Economy.” - The jury committee: Prof. dr. Cees van Riel, dr. Guido Berens, dr. Mignon van Halderen, prof. dr. Gerrit van Bruggen and prof. dr. Slawek Magala.

awards.title: Silver and Bronze Stevie® awards for the campaign STORIES OF POSSIBLE
awards.description: The Stories of Possible campaign is to capture, in a series of six personal stories, our customers' ambition and how SABIC helps to ‘make possible’ their visions to create value for the long term. SABIC’s customers starring in the campaign are: Kringlan Composites, Elopak, Kartell, Plast-Box, the Spanish City of Cartagena and Siemens. Created by Aline Stanworth, Stories of Possible are hosted at sabic.com/storiesofpossible.

profile_positions.description:
SABIC is one of the world's largest petrochemical companies, offering a unique and comprehensive product portfolio of engineering thermoplastics through the SBU Innovative Plastics. 

As Communication Leader, Aline's role is to act as business partner to senior leadership, creating and leading the implementation of strategic communications for Innovative Plastics in Europe. Some of Aline's scope of activities in the region are: power SABIC’s commercial efforts with innovative Marketing Communications, build SABIC's brand equity in Europe, partner with Country Leaders and Public Affairs to support and advance SABIC's reputation and promote internal alignment, pride and identification to SABIC.
